title: Fix issues skill: Add missing epic methods to IssueService
description: Epic commands fail because set_epic() and clear_epic() methods missing from IssueService. Add: set_epic(issue_id, epic_id), clear_epic(issue_id), get_epic_issues(epic_id), create_epic(title, description), list_epics().

title: Add hierarchical epic support with parent_epic_id
description: Add parent_epic_id column to epics table. Support nested epics (epic → sub-epic → issues). Add commands: epics tree, epics create --parent, issues list --epic --include-children. Enable milestone-based organization.

title: Create docs skill for structured documentation
description: New docs skill with tables: docs_documents (id, title, content, epic_id, version), docs_versions (version history). Commands: create, get, update, list, search, export. Link each doc to one top-level epic. Rich markdown rendering.
